pullRequest.title: [extensionservice] Add more null annotations
pullRequest.bodyText: The add-ons port would break without these annotations when openhab/openhab-core#1421 gets merged.

commit.message:
[extensionservice] Add more null annotations

Signed-off-by: Wouter Born <github@maindrain.net>

beforeCommit.message:
[extensionservice] Add more null annotations

Signed-off-by: Wouter Born <github@maindrain.net>

afterCommit.message:
[extensionservice] Add more null annotations

Signed-off-by: Wouter Born <github@maindrain.net>

nodes.bodyText: Using @NonNullByDefault({}) is the only way to be compatible with both annotated and non-annotated classes.

There is a slight chance that getNodes() is called in between the clear() and addAll(..). Perhaps we should synchronize the critical sections on cachedNodes so it's thread safe and still performs well.

commit.message:
Use cachedNodes array again for easy atomic assignments

Signed-off-by: Wouter Born <github@maindrain.net>

Prevent code from messing with cachedNodes

Signed-off-by: Wouter Born <github@maindrain.net>
